topic.title: Nobody Lives On Australia
topic.body: They'd fall off bc it's on the bottom of the planet. And I know what you're thinking. What about South America? How do they stay on the planet. Simple. Trees make air and that air pushes people up while they'd normally fall down and these forces equalize to make it so they don't fall off the bottom half of the planet. Australia has no rainforest so there's no air being made by the trees to push them upwards.

1565669207_1BP5GrM5EDw9SVGmRJan1kvQ2DB2X.body:
> [publicality](#comment_11_1BP5GrM5EDw9SVGmRJan1kvQ2DB2Xm1Rgo): oh :odoes it helps?

It does but only because it's not being abused. If you were to take desoxyn without having ADD you'd probably end up reliant on it for productivity which is kinda the catch 22. My advice is to try other means of staying productive before going to get diagnosed. As for me I already did and there was definitely an imalance chemically. I'm normal now but without my meds? Totally different person. Lazy, unfocused, and unmotivated... and none of that by choice!

Not that it has much abuse potential tbh. I shared it with street meth users once just to see if I could make some extra cash selling it. Nah. They prefer the dirty stuff. Turns out when you're used to smoking 50 mgs of street crank every few hours 5 to 10 mgs of pure meth is about as stimulating as a cup of tea.

1566074416_1PGDKdsYUcJajEbqqgb91pJp1rUzz.body:
Thanks to nepotism I work for an NSA contractor. We get a lot of traffic across government sites and since my relative owns the business he trusts me to lock up and tcob at the end of the day. Sometimes he's there late with me and we're coding through the night, sometimes I'm alone. When it's the latter I sometimes take the liberty to check out some of the documents we have stored for the agency proper. Most of it is mundane bureaucratic stuff. Spreadsheets, pdfs, etc etc. But then there's the cool stuff. You hear about the way the CIA, NSA, and the DOD experimented with psychics? Yeah that hasn't stopped. There's a huge document that's got the name of anyone in the agency with matrilinial jewish ancestry. There's a video from what I think is somewhere in Afghanistan (?) around either sun-up or sun-down that shows the soldier confronting this guy who's in this really creepily lit apartment thing like IDK where it takes place but he's hunched into his knees in a corner and you can see the soldier reach a hand out, I guess he thinks the guy is drunk or mentally ill? I dunno, but he does look filthy and suspicious (like hiding in a cave for ten years filthy) and it lifts it's head up and the footage gets all glitchy and you can't see the guy through the heavy artifacts and corruption but you see the camera just drop and this guy's filthy feet (no more glitching, I think bc his head is out of sight again) and it's pretty fucking clear whoever this soldier was he's dead.

That isn't even a quarter of the shit I've seen either. Very little media, but PDFs will have screengrabs from videos sometimes. Also when I open some of the documents on my work from home machine I get this weird Atari-like glitching sound coming from my speakers occasionally. Like an atari explosion sound.
Also my great grandpa was in the ahnenerbe, got swept up in operation paperclip, aaaaand apparently a lot of the people in my family (myself included) are psychics and witches.

The nazis? Definitely had UFOs. Dunno how they work. Don't know anything else but that my great grandpa saw one (but wasn't supposed to). The Americans have them now thanks to Paperclip and complete luck regarding where the krauts stored the majority of them. The russians did have one, to the best of his knowledge, but no one knows if they still do because supposedly one of his contacts in Khabarovsk said that after the collapse of the soviet union the russian mobs had basically taken over everything and that the last they knew, one of the mobs had it. It's been MIA ever since.

The working theory is Putin has it and that's his ace in the hole, but that's just speculation at this point. He knows America is run by Nazis (not Trump, I mean post-Paperclip boomers raised on old-school nazi teachings) but chances are equally likely some Ukranian billionaire has it sitting in a barn somewhere. Who really knows?

Oh and it turns out the hebrew god? Capitol G? Yeah he's actually the devil which makes sense if you've ever read a word of the bibble or any abrahamic book. And Lucifer? Satan? Baphomet? Macroscale quantum mechanical beings. You call them angels. Turns out they're the good ones. Satan is rational. Understood that Y--H's influence on man was harmful for us so he made a wager with him but the guy was so hard for god he nearly cleaved his baby in half and Satan was banished for making H-m look bad. Lucifer? Refused to bow because he was right. We're not superior. He's a macroscale quantum being. And an extremely powerful one at that. He could turn you into a puff of hydrogen with pure willpower. And the reason Baphomet showed themselves to witches, mostly, was because we're typically well educated (communing with Lucifer and Caim has it's perks) and open minded to the truth.  Nowadays it's more mainstream to be satanist or luciferian or a thaumaturge because humanity as a whole is experiencing an awakening or rather a reawakening of things that were lost or hidden to us.

And if you don't believe me, well. the bible says a woman's rapist can legally own her by paying her father two pieces of silver. Satan says fuck no rape is bad and you should be fucking imprisoned for doing it.

Also there was a great flood, technically because Earth got ass-raped by a fuckton of comets. Atlantis and Mu were flooded because the comets hit the ice caps melting them and ending an ice age which resulted in a great flood myth throughout the world. Egyptian gods were refugees from Atlantis, Thule and Hy-Brasil (both of which are safe, now) and actually they were Thaumaturges. Potent ones at that. More like gods than the watered down stuff you see from our kind today.
Although he's always been pretty rational about that. Witches were mostly women and tended to be pretty favorable towards the angel saying "no rape!" vs the guy preaching "sell your raped daughters!"
Plus doing magic is cool as fuck.

1566178418_1aaGBN84Cc8VE7iocUxPXiRVhx9qS.body:
> [bigbadbob](#comment_347_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): Do you see shadow people at night? Are you dead? Do they gangstalk you?

Nah I just think it's weird lol

Actually, I don't think in the 14+ years I've been leaving my body I've ever seen another person or entity who could see me. Althouuuugh a neighbor's kid said his little brother saw me the other night. I told him I usually walk around at night (not untrue) and he said his brother saw me walking through a wall.

Did see a gnome once tho! It was funny because it wasn't wearing a hat or anything (actually, it was more like a knobby, creepy little man with a disproportionately large dick) but it was funny watching it waddle across the street.
Mostly to just kill time. I feel just as rested if I'm dreaming as if I don't dream and sit up without my body.

> [bigbadbob](#comment_351_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): should get more creative and really have fun with it

I mean other than listen in on private conversations or watch people watch tv / fuck / sleep there's not much to do. I can't physically move anything or interact with shit. Talking to anyone is just wasting breath, trust me, I thought I had died and become a ghost the first time it happened.
Also it's not like Stranger Things. I can't just be anywhere, it seems to be tethered to wherever I lie down at. But the good news is there doesn't seem to be a limit distance or time wise.

> [bigbadbob](#comment_353_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): What kind of drugs do you do... sounds pretty far out

It's just how my brain is man. I feel really good like my brain is swelling and then it's like sitting up but I can see myself if I turn around.

I think the closest thing I could describe it to as far as how it feels is being in a float tank. It's like there's nothing but me and everything around me. This weird state of zen. And everyone's kinda echo-ey and there's this blue white haze to everything and you just float there and will yourself into movement. It's so fucking beautiful.

> [bigbadbob](#comment_354_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): Im not one to deny someones own experience.  I certainly cannot do any of that.  So long as you are enjoying yourself:)

I appreciate that homie. Hopefully MRIs become less expensive so I can prove *something* is going on. Ideally what I wanna do is have a locked room, myself in an MRI in the room adjacent to the locked room, and in the locked room a computer with a random number gen, a random shape gen, and a random simple picture gen. And an independent 3rd party to verify no funny business. The MRI would likely show a change in conscious activity once I leave my body and then once I read what's in the locked room from outside my body I end the OBE and tell the independent 3rd party what I saw. Then they unlock the room and verify that I'm correct and hopefully that proves *something* spoopy is happening.
